title: Former Trump intel boss considered for special Iran envoy
shortDescription: Grenell, former acting Director of National Intelligence, was earlier mentioned as a possible Ukraine war envoy.

title: Trump names Kari Lake, news media foe, to lead Voice of America
shortDescription: Lake, a former newscaster, was in the running for ambassador to Mexico. Instead she'll lead a global news outlet charged with defending democracy.

title: President Biden commutes nearly 1,500 sentences and pardons 39 people
shortDescription: Biden said he will "take more steps in the weeks ahead" and continue to review clemency petitions to advance "equal justice under the law."

title: Watch live: Donald Trump rings opening bell at NYSE
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump will ring the bell at the New York Stock Exchange for the first time Thursday.

title: How Donald Trump soured on the FBI director he appointed
shortDescription: The FBI director and former top Justice Department official has been taking criticism from Trump since Trump appointed him in 2017

title: Look back at Trump's historic victory with new book, front page poster
shortDescription: “Donald Trump: The Road to a Historic Second Term,” is a 160-page hardcover volume that documents Trump’s unprecedented return to the White House.

title: REPORTS: Trump expected to win Time's Person of the Year award
shortDescription: Trump is on the short list of finalists for the recognition. He won it in 2016.

title: Who is Bettina Anderson? The socialite has been linked to Trump Jr.
shortDescription: Photos of Donald Trump Jr. and Bettina Anderson circulated just hours before his fiancé Kimberly Guilfoyle was nominated to be ambassador to Greece.

title: Trump extended family members will serve in his administration
shortDescription: Trump has recently tapped family ties to lead diplomacy and foreign policy. Who are his picks?

title: Donald Trump will ring opening bell at New York Stock Exchange
shortDescription: Donald Trump's invitation to ring opening bell at New York Stock Exchange comes just one month before his historic return to the White House.

title: FBI Director Wray to resign amid Trump criticism
shortDescription: FBI Director Christopher Wray had been a constant target of criticism from President-elect Donald Trump, who already named his successor.

title: Image of Christian article on Biden pardon is fabricated | Fact check
shortDescription: No such article appears on the website for The Gospel Coalition, a Christian news and commentary website.

title: Did Donald Trump Jr. and fiancée Kimberly Guilfoyle call it quits?
shortDescription: Questions about Donald Trump Jr.'s relationship with Kimberly Guilfoyle surface after he was spotted holding hands with socialite Bettina Anderson.

title: Donald Trump picks Kimberly Guilfoyle as US ambassador to Greece
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has selected Kimberly Guilfoyle to serve as the next US ambassador to Greece.

title: Democratic Reps. call on Biden to commute federal death sentences
shortDescription: Dem. Reps. Ayana Pressley and Cori Bush called for Biden to commute the death sentences of those on federal death row in a press conference Tuesday.

title: Wisconsin attorney general adds 10 charges in Trump fake elector case
shortDescription: Wisconsin's AG slaps a handful of felonies against 2020 fake elector case defendants, Kenneth Chesebro, James Troupis and Mike Roman.

title: Donald Trump picks former Fox News host Kimberly Guilfoyle as ambassador to Greece
shortDescription: Guilfoyle is a former prosecutor and worked at Fox News for more than a decade. She has been romantically linked to Donald Trump Jr.

title: White House condemns violence against 'corporate greed' after CEO murder
shortDescription: "Violence to combat any sort of corporate greed is unacceptable," White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said.

title: Who is Andrew Ferguson? Donald Trump taps commissioner to lead FTC
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday tapped Federal Trade Commissioner Andrew Ferguson to lead the consumer protection and antitrust agency.
